description: The Kinivo WID320 is a 802.11n USB dongle that can allow you to connect to WiFi networks with speeds upto 300 Mbps. It has a small form factor and can be used with any Windows, Linux or Mac computer via USB. The WID320 is ideal for connecting computers wirelessly to your home router or a wireless network.Key Features- Wireless speeds up to 300 Mbps with 802.11n and channel bonding- Compatible with all 802.11g/b/n 2.4GHz wireless networks- Supports security encryption using WEP, WPA and WPA2 (TKIP+AES)- Compatible with Windows operating systems- Three working modes: Infrastructure, Ad-Hoc and Soft APNote:The WID320 does not operate in the 5GHz frequency with dual band routersDevice compatibility- WID320 transforms any computer with a USB port to a wireless capable computer- Supports 802.11n wireless N networks-Compatible with Windows 8 / Windows 7 / Vista / XP- Backwards compatible with 802.11b and 802.11g wireless networksWhat's in the Box- Kinivo WID320 Wireless USB Adapter- Installation CD (1 inch) for Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista, XPNote:Drivers are also available online on Kinivo support website.WarrantyKinivo WID320 Wireless USB Adapter is backed by our 1 year limited hardware warranty. Please contact us if you have any questions.
title: Kinivo 300Mbps Wireless-N USB Adapter - (802.11b/g/n) - Supports Windows 8/ Windows 7/ Vista/ XP
